DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single mask , comparative , mono-therapeutic trial evaluate three fluoroquinolone agent approve marketed treatment conjunctivitis . Approximately 120 patient corneal ulcer great 2 mm less 6 mm size meet inclusion criterion enrol study . Patients randomize 2:1:1 ratio receive besifloxacin 0.6 % ophthalmic suspension , gatifloxacin 0.5 % ophthalmic solution , moxifloxacin 0.5 % ophthalmic solution .
